--------------------
Text: "The Happening" is a 1967 song recorded by Motown artists The Supremes.
Triplets:<The Supremes
1:
--------------------
Text: The Happening (song):  The song served as the theme song of the 1967 Columbia Pictures film "The Happening", and was released as a single by Motown at the time of the film's release that spring.

Triplets:<The Happening
2:
--------------------
Text: The Happening (song):  While the movie flopped, the song peaked at number-one on the "Billboard" Hot 100 pop singles chart in May, becoming The Supremes' tenth number-one single in the United States, peaking in the top 10 on the UK Pop Chart at number six, and in the top 5 in the Australian Pop Chart and in the Dutch Pop Chart.
Triplets:<The Supremes
